body: I agreed with LaLover with his "mind your own fictional fantasy" take, til he went misogynist mode
the guy below me needs to get help

Not liking netorare is fine but you all who hate it so much you become aggressive are all a bunch of insecure idiots.
First of all they are fictional stories so you are literally getting angry over nothing, second, instead of projecting on Araragi and feel like you are getting cucked, project on the rapists, the feeling of double conquest is amazing, not only you take a girl's body but you steal another man's girl from him. That's fucking hot and appeals to the most basic male nature. 

Rape, conquest and steal!
shadow033 I agree with you, I prefer when araragi fuck them with sweet love XD
If this page had something like a "dislike" button i'd definitely mark this one and all doujinshis with netorare in monogatari, i don't care about anything else
I've realised that my head isn't comfortable with Monogatari hentai. The only one that I am, is with AraragixKaren.
Because he was seen as a villian that'd do anything for money up until Monogatari Series Second Season.
Ill never understand why artist feel like they need to make Kaiki the villain in these.
